room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Had Family in from Pennsylvania and Colorado. We decided to go to the Escape Rooms for a family "bonding" experience and to try to catch the serial killer, "The Mayflower." WE MADE IT ! Escaped with 22 seconds left! Thanks MEMPHIS ESCAPE ROOM for a terrific experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: We had a great time and loved The Mayflower. It was awesome and we did escape with 11 seconds to spare! I can't wait to do another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: My friends and I didn't know expect much going in, but we were blown away by the experience. We are all pumped to return and try out the other 3 rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Awesome! Awesome! Awesome!The experience was awesome, but even better, the people that ran the place were very friendly, super personable, and seemed like all around good folks.We went for Mayflower a few weeks ago and we are back tonight for Parallax!! We're gonna make it out! (I hope)

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: I've officially escaped The Mayflower and What's in the Box and loved both experiences. They were both unique and challenging in their own ways and the staff is awesome. I can't wait to go back. I think we're going to do Parallax next!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: We had an absolute blast. We escaped the mayflower room with a little over three minutes left and enjoyed the entire process. I highly recommend this for a group of friends or a great date night!

room_title: Escape room "The Mayflower" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: My coworkers and I were in town for a few days and decided to do The Mayflower room on a whim. We had an absolute blast. The room is well thought out and challenging. We escaped with just over two minutes left.The staff and owners that we met were all great and the customer service is top notch. After The Mayflower we spoke with Keith and told him how bummed we were that we were leaving town and wouldn't be able to do the new Carnival Asylum room. He arranged to stay open late so that we could come in and try our hand at that room. (Thanks, Keith!) We had just as much fun the second time. The storyline of the room is fun with just enough of a Halloween vibe to make it fun. Highly recommended!
